scripts.dev:cleanup: lsof -ti:5173 | xargs -r kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && lsof -ti:8000 | xargs -r kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && cd backend && docker compose down 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.dev:fastapi: cd backend && uv run uvicorn app.main:app --reload --port 8000
scripts.dev:valkey: cd backend && docker compose up valkey
scripts.dev:services: cd backend && docker compose up valkey || echo 'Valkey not running - Redis operations will fail'
scripts.dev: bun run dev:cleanup && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names "Supabase,Valkey,Vite,FastAPI" --prefix-colors "green,cyan,magenta,blue" "supabase status" "bun run dev:services" "bun run dev:vite" "bun run dev:fastapi"
scripts.dev:local-lens: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names "Supabase,Valkey,Vite,FastAPI,LocalLens" --prefix-colors "green,cyan,magenta,blue,white" "supabase status" "bun run dev:services" "bun run dev:vite" "bun run dev:fastapi" "local-lens"
scripts.backend:start: cd backend && uv run uvicorn app.main:app --port 8000
